name: Unfulfilled Destiny
text: Give to the Gamora player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Gamora → remove Unfulfilled Destiny from the game. - Choose and discard 2 events from your hand. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "One day, sister, our father will see that I am far more worthy than you." - Nebula
name: Sibling Rivalry
text: Players other than Gamora cannot remove threat from Sibling Rivalry Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, deal 1 facedown encounter card to Gamora.

name: Nebula
text: Retaliate 2. Forced Interrupt: When this minion would enter play, discard the Nebula ally from play. (Gamora's nemesis minion.)

name: In A Bind
text: Attach to Gamora. Treat Gamora's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[traits]]). Hero Action: Choose and discard an [[attack]] event from your hand and deal 1 damage to Gamora → discard this card.

flavor: "You won'd be father's favorite for much longer, dear sister" - Nebula
name: Waylay
text: When Revealed: Stun and confusa Gamora. If Gamora is already stunned or confused, this card gains surge.
